comments: 'T.M.MacDougall' as author of Nopalxochia conzattianum in Cact. Succ. J. (Los Angeles), 19: 22 (1947) is an error see J. New York Bot. Gard., 49: 158-160 (1948)
examples: Pachycereus tehuantepecanus T.MacDoug. & Bravo in Cact. Suc. Mex., 1: 64 (1956).
source: Obit. in Gard. J. New York Bot. Gard., 25(2): 49-53 (1975), incl. portraits.  See also, Cactus & Co., 15(2): 60-71 (2011).
